mail.title: Mail Handler Configuration
mail.portHelp: Server port (993 for IMAP SSL, 995 for POP3 SSL)
mail.usernameHelp: Email address or username for authentication
mail.checkIntervalHelp: How often to check for new emails
mail.helpTipContent: Most email providers require 'App Passwords' instead of your regular password. Check your email provider's security settings.
mail.departmentsDescription: Configure up to 10 target email addresses for forwarding processed emails
mail.departmentNote: You must set at least one department as DEFAULT. Processed emails will be forwarded to the appropriate department based on content analysis.
mail.processingNote: Mail handler will automatically process incoming emails and forward them to appropriate departments.
mail.testConnectionDescription: Review your configuration and test the connection to ensure everything is working correctly.
mail.handlerNameHelp: Give this mail handler a descriptive name
mail.savedHandlersDesc: Manage your automated email processing configurations
mail.noHandlersDesc: Create your first mail handler to start automating email processing
mail.bulkDeleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} mail handler(s)? This action cannot be undone.
mail.handlerSavedTestFailed: Handler saved, but connection test failed
mail.deleteHandlerConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.
mail.smtpConfigHelp: Configure SMTP settings to forward processed emails to departments using your own mail server. SMTP configuration is required for email forwarding to work.
mail.smtpPortHelp: SMTP port (587 for STARTTLS, 465 for SSL/TLS)
mail.smtpPasswordHelp: Password for SMTP authentication (encrypted in database)
mail.emailFilterHelp: Define which emails should be processed and forwarded to departments.
mail.filterNewOnlyHelp: Process only emails received after this handler is activated. This is the recommended setting.
mail.filterHistoricalHelp: Process emails from a specific time period, including past emails. Available for PRO users and above.
mail.filterFromDateHelp: Emails from this date onwards will be processed (including future emails)

taskPrompts.selectPromptHelpAdmin: Select a prompt to edit. System prompts apply to all users. Use 'Create New' for personal overrides.

sortingPrompt.title: Preprocessor
sortingPrompt.description: The preprocessor handles the incoming message. It gets the message as a JSON object and returns a JSON object.
sortingPrompt.promptEditorLink: to change existing prompts OR add new prompts
sortingPrompt.mainTitle: Set BTOPIC and Tools in JSON
sortingPrompt.mainDescription: Define the intention of the user with every request. You will have the history, but put your focus on the new message.
sortingPrompt.jsonDescription: The JSON object is the form we save your request into the database.
sortingPrompt.jsonNote: The whole object is passed to the preprocessor. The preprocessor can change the object and return it to the central process. The central process will save the changed object into the database.
sortingPrompt.jsonExample: Here is an example of the JSON object:
sortingPrompt.btopicNote: The preprocessor can also return a new JSON object. That is setting the topic and by that, directing the message to a specific prompt. The BTOPIC is the name of YOUR TARGET prompt!

setupChat.title: AI Setup Assistant
setupChat.subtitle: Let's configure your widget together

setupChat.editHintDescription: After saving, you can edit the AI assistant configuration anytime in the widget's Advanced Settings under the 'AI Assistant' tab.

advancedConfig.title: Advanced Configuration
advancedConfig.widgetActiveHelp: Enable or disable this widget. Inactive widgets won't respond to messages.
advancedConfig.widgetInactiveWarning: This widget is currently inactive and won't respond to visitor messages.
advancedConfig.autoOpenHelp: Automatically open the chat widget when page loads
advancedConfig.messageLimitHelp: Maximum messages allowed per chat session (1-100)
advancedConfig.maxFileSizeHelp: Maximum file size for uploads (1-50 MB)
advancedConfig.allowFileUploadHelp: Let visitors upload files to the chat
advancedConfig.fileUploadUnlimitedDescription: Setting the limit to 0 allows unlimited file uploads. This may increase server resource usage and storage costs.
advancedConfig.allowedDomainsHelp: Only these domains can embed and use your widget. Leave empty to allow all domains.
advancedConfig.noDomainsYet: No domains configured. Widget can be embedded on any website.
advancedConfig.localhostWarningDescription: Keeping localhost or 127.0.0.1 in the allow list enables testing but should be removed before sharing the widget publicly to avoid security risks.
advancedConfig.aiSetupRequiredDescription: To customize your AI assistant, you first need to complete the guided AI setup. This will help configure the perfect assistant for your needs.
advancedConfig.restartAiSetupDescription: Start the guided setup again to reconfigure your assistant.
advancedConfig.systemPromptDescription: This widget uses a shared system prompt that cannot be edited directly. To customize the behavior, run the AI setup to create your own personalized prompt.
advancedConfig.selectionRulesPlaceholder: When should this prompt be used?
advancedConfig.selectionRulesHelp: Define when this assistant configuration should be activated based on user queries.
advancedConfig.aiModelHelp: Select the AI model to use for this widget. Automated will choose the best model available.
advancedConfig.promptContentPlaceholder: Enter the instructions for your AI assistant...
advancedConfig.promptContentHelp: This is the system prompt that defines how your AI assistant behaves and responds.
advancedConfig.knowledgeBaseDescription: Upload documents or select from your file manager to give your assistant access to specific information.
advancedConfig.noFilesYet: No files uploaded yet. Upload documents to enhance your assistant's knowledge.

filePicker.title: Select Files
filePicker.noFiles: No vectorized files available. Upload files first in the File Manager.

widgets.fileUploadLimitHelp: Maximum number of files each visitor can upload per session. Set to 0 for unlimited uploads.

error.contactSupport: If this problem persists, please contact our support team with the error details below.

processing.classifyingDesc: AI is analyzing the intent and content
processing.generatingDesc: AI is crafting your answer with

chatShare.benefit1: Anyone with the link can view the conversation
chatShare.benefit2: Searchable by Google and other search engines
chatShare.benefit3: Perfect for sharing knowledge and examples

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.description: We use cookies to analyze website traffic and optimize your experience. By accepting, you consent to analytics cookies.

shared.title: Shared Chat
shared.subtitle: Shared conversation via Synaplan AI
shared.notFoundDesc: This chat doesn't exist or is no longer shared publicly.
shared.infoDesc: This chat was shared publicly and can be found by search engines like Google.
shared.ctaTitle: Want to create your own AI conversations?
shared.ctaDesc: Synaplan AI helps you build intelligent chatbots, automate workflows, and create amazing AI-powered experiences.

memories.title: Memories
memories.description: Important information about you and your preferences that the AI can use for future conversations.
memories.emptyDesc: The AI will automatically extract relevant information from your conversations and store it here. You can also manually add new memories.

userDisabled.title: Memories are disabled for your account
userDisabled.message: The AI will not use or automatically update memories. You can enable this in your profile settings at any time.

unavailable.title: Memories are being set up
unavailable.message: The memories system is currently being configured and is temporarily unavailable. This may take a few minutes.

create.title: New Memory
create.categoryHint: You can enter any category name

form.easyDescription: Just describe what you want to remember and AI will structure it for you.
form.easyPlaceholder: e.g. I prefer dark mode in all applications, My favorite programming language is TypeScript, I work best in the morning...
form.easyHint: Write naturally - the AI will extract the key information.
form.easyEditDescription: Tell me what you want to change about this memory.
form.easyEditPlaceholder: e.g. Change the value to..., Update this to..., Delete this memory...
form.easyEditHint: Describe the change naturally - the AI will understand.
form.whatToChange: What would you like to change?
form.aiUnavailable: AI structuring unavailable, saving as note
form.previewDescription: Check if this looks correct before saving.
form.similarFound: Similar memories found - consider updating instead:

delete.title: Delete Memory
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this memory? This action cannot be undone.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Memory?
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this memory? This action cannot be undone.

bulkDeleteConfirm.title: Delete Multiple Memories?
bulkDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete {count} memories? This action cannot be undone.

serviceDisabled.title: Memories Disabled
serviceDisabled.message: The memory service is currently unavailable. Please contact the administrator.
serviceDisabled.tooltip: The memory service is disabled or unreachable. This memory cannot be displayed.

referenceMissing.tooltip: This memory is no longer available. It may have been deleted, or the service could not load it.

referencePending.tooltip: This memory was just created or updated. It may take a few seconds until it can be loaded.

memories.loginToView: Log in to view memory details

deleteDialog.title: Delete memory?
deleteDialog.message: This will remove the memory from your saved data.

graph.noResultsDesc: No memories found in selected categories.
graph.noResultsKeys: No memories found with selected keys.

falsePositive.title: Mark false positive
falsePositive.subtitle: Select the incorrect parts or use the full answer.
falsePositive.emptyHint: Select at least one section or use the full answer.
falsePositive.summaryPlaceholder: e.g. The AI claimed that Sydney is the capital of Australia
falsePositive.summaryOptionsHint: The AI suggests multiple options. Pick the one that best describes the error, or write your own.
falsePositive.correctionPlaceholder: e.g. The capital of Australia is Canberra
falsePositive.correctionOptionsHint: Choose the most accurate correction, or write your own.
falsePositive.savedAsNegative: The AI will avoid this answer in the future
falsePositive.savedAsPositive: The AI will learn the correct answer from this
falsePositive.explanation: Your feedback helps the AI improve: The incorrect statement teaches what to avoid, and the correction (if provided) teaches the right answer. Both are remembered for future conversations.
falsePositive.memoryExplanation: The AI detected this is about your personal data. The correction will update your memories instead of creating feedback entries ‚Äî so the AI always has your correct information.
falsePositive.savedAsMemory: This will update your personal memory
falsePositive.memoryUpdated: Your memory has been updated successfully.
falsePositive.memoryDeleted: The incorrect memory has been deleted.
falsePositive.deleteMemoryOptionHint: Remove the incorrect memory without saving a replacement. Use this when the information should simply not exist.
falsePositive.willDeleteMemory: The incorrect memory will be deleted (no replacement saved)
falsePositive.enhanceHint: Tip: Use Enhance to improve your text
falsePositive.enhanceFailed: Could not enhance text. Please try again.
falsePositive.researchOptionHint: Search your files or the web for reliable sources
falsePositive.researchNoResultsKb: No relevant sources found in your data.
falsePositive.researchNoResultsHintKb: Try uploading documents, saving more feedback, or switching to web search.
falsePositive.researchNoResultsHintWeb: Try different search terms or use 'Write my own'.
falsePositive.researchSelectHint: Select the sources that contain the correct information:
falsePositive.needSummaryFirst: Please select or enter the false claim first

contradiction.title: Contradiction detected
contradiction.subtitle: The AI found conflicting information in your existing data.
contradiction.explanation: What you want to save may conflict with existing entries. For each conflict, decide whether to replace the old entry or keep both. Click on an item to toggle your decision.
contradiction.deleteOnlyHint: Selected memories will be deleted (no replacement)

list.title: Feedback
list.subtitle: Manage your AI corrections and feedback examples.
list.emptyHint: Use the thumbs-down button on AI responses to add corrections.
list.noResultsHint: Try a different search term or change the filter.
list.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this feedback? This cannot be undone.
list.bulkDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all selected feedback entries? This cannot be undone.

externalLink.title: External Website
externalLink.subtitle: You are about to leave Synaplan
externalLink.disclaimer: You are being redirected to an external website. We have no control over the content and are not responsible for data protection or security on third-party sites. Proceed at your own risk.
